name: n8n-agent
description: A2A agent server specialized in generating and automating n8n workflows

skills.name: search_n8n_docs
skills.description: Search through N8N node documentation to find relevant information about specific nodes, their parameters, and usage patterns

node_type.description: Optional filter by specific node type (e.g., "webhook", "http", "database")

query.description: Search query to find relevant N8N nodes or documentation

skills.name: generate_n8n_workflow
skills.description: Generate complete N8N workflow YAML configurations based on user requirements, using documented nodes and best practices

integrations.description: List of services or platforms to integrate (e.g., ["slack", "gmail", "database"])

workflow_description.description: Description of what the workflow should accomplish
